info.readme:
This package will install the uSkinned Source Starter Kit.
After installation completes the content area will contain some example website content to get you started.

DURING INSTALLATION YOU WILL BE REDIRECTED AWAY FROM THIS PAGE. YOU MUST WAIT UNTIL THE INSTALLATION COMPLETE MESSAGE IS DISPLAYED BEFORE NAVIGATING AWAY FROM THIS PAGE. PLEASE BE PATIENT.

Info.Name: Accordion/Tab Item
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Accordion/Tab" to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Accordion/Tab Item

The node name you enter above will be displayed as the "Item Heading".

For example, if using this for a Question/Answer the name you enter will be displayed as the "Question". If you have chosen the "Tabbed" style the name will be used as the "Tab Heading".

Info.Name: Accordion/Tabbed Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Accordion" or "Tabbed" section to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Accordion/Tabbed Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

You must add at least one "Accordion/Tab Item" below this folder.

The order of your "Accordion/Tab Items" within this folder directly relates to the order your "Accordion/Tab Items" will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your "Accordion/Tab Items".

Info.Name: Advanced Component Master
Info.Description: This Document Type is used as a container to manage all Document Types that are related to Advanced Components.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable delete
GenericProperty.Description: If "Yes" is selected, when a user attempts to delete this node they will be presented with a warning message indicating that this node cannot be deleted.

Info.Name: Advanced Page
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Advanced Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Subpage listing link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Sub navigation link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Advanced Page

To add content to this page you are required to add components to the "Page Components" folder directly below this page.

By adding new components you will be able to organise the layout and content of this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Page summary
GenericProperty.Description: Summary text is only displayed if this page appears on a "Subpage Listing".

GenericProperty.Name: Listing image
GenericProperty.Description:
Listing image is only displayed if this page appears on a "Sub Page Listing".

Image will be cropped to 400px x 300px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

Info.Name: Advanced Page Blog Post
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Advanced Page Blog Post".

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable comments
GenericProperty.Description: Tick this box to disable commenting for this post. This is only relevant if you have entered a "Disqus username" on your "Blog Landing Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Categories
GenericProperty.Description: If selecting a child category make sure you also select the parent categories.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Advanced Page Blog Post

To add content to this page you are required to add components to the "Page Components" folder directly below this page.

By adding new components you will be able to organise the layout and content of this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Listing image
GenericProperty.Description:
Image will be cropped to 1140px x 550px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

Info.Name: Advanced Page Components Folder
Info.Description: This item is added automatically to "Advanced Pages" to organise your page components.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Page Components

Add components below this folder to organise the layout and content of your page.

The order of your components within this folder directly relates to the order your components will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your components.

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

Info.Name: Alert Box
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Alert Box" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Alert Box

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Banner
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Banner" to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description:
For all Parallax and Takeover banners, your image will be cropped to 1600px by 1600px.

If you choose a 'Medium' banner style without the Parallax effect your image will be cropped to 1600px by 700px.

If you choose a 'Short' banner style without the Parallax effect your image will be cropped to 1600px by 500px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description:
Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

If the banner contains an image, use the color that works best for the text over the image.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Banner

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Banner Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Banner Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Banner Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

You must add at least one "Banner" below this folder.

The order of your "Banners" within this folder directly relates to the order your "Banners" will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your "Banners".

Info.Name: Blockquote
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Blockquote" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blockquote

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Blockquote Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blockquote Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blockquote Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Blog Author
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blog Author".

GenericProperty.Name: Author bio
GenericProperty.Description: The author bio will appear below every blog post associated with this author and should contain a short snippet about the author.

GenericProperty.Name: Author page
GenericProperty.Description:
Use this to link to the authors page which could be an external blog or a page on this website. If something is entered here the authors name on blog listings and blog post pages will link to this page.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Author

The node name you enter above will be used for the "Author Name" displayed on the website.

Info.Name: Blog Authors Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to organise the "Blog Authors".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Authors

Create items below this folder to add new "Blog Authors".

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

Info.Name: Blog Categories Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to organise the "Blog Categories".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Categories

Create items below this folder to add new "Blog Categories".

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

Info.Name: Blog Category
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blog Category".

GenericProperty.Name: Introduction
GenericProperty.Description: Displayed only on page one of the "Blog Landing Page" when this category is selected.

GenericProperty.Name: Category page title
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Category

The node name you enter above will be used for the "Category Name" displayed on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Open Graph description
GenericProperty.Description: A detailed description of the piece of content, usually between 2 and 4 sentences. This tag is technically optional, but can improve the rate at which links are read and shared.

GenericProperty.Name: Open Graph title
GenericProperty.Description: Use this field to override the default Open Graph title of your category listing page. The default Open Graph title will be a combination of the category name, blog landing page node name and the website name defined in "Global Settings".

GenericProperty.Name: Meta description
GenericProperty.Description: Use this field to enter a description for your category listing page. This is the information that is displayed by search engines when your website appears in a search listing. Try and keep this below 155 characters.

GenericProperty.Name: Open Graph image
GenericProperty.Description: This is an image associated with your media. We suggest that you use an image of at least 1200x630 pixels. If nothing is uploaded here the "Default Open Graph image" from your "Global Settings" will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Web page header title
GenericProperty.Description: Use this field to override the default page title of your category listing page. The default page title will be a combination of the category name, blog landing page node name and the website name defined in "Global Settings".

Info.Name: Blog Landing Page
Info.Description: Use this item to create a "Blog Landing Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Page layout
GenericProperty.Description: Default page layout will be displayed if nothing is selected. If 'Content full width' is selected sub navigation will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Summary text character count
GenericProperty.Description: Enter the number of characters of text you would like displayed from the beginning of each blog article. If nothing is entered, no summary text will be displayed.

GenericProperty.Name: Default author
GenericProperty.Description: Select the default author that will be applied to all blog posts.

GenericProperty.Name: Disqus username
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is entered, blog commenting will be disabled.

GenericProperty.Name: Blog listing page size
GenericProperty.Description: Enter the number of articles you would like to appear per page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Landing Page

This page will list your blog posts. Blog posts are added to this section via the "Posts" folder directly below this page.

Info.Name: Blog Master
Info.Description:
This Document Type is used as a container to manage all Document Types that are related to the Blog.
Blog Landing and Blog Post are found below Content Master/Standard Page Master since these are physical pages.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable delete
GenericProperty.Description: If "Yes" is selected, when a user attempts to delete this node they will be presented with a warning message indicating that this node cannot be deleted.

Info.Name: Blog Month Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blog Month Folder".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Month Folder

Use this folder as a container to organise your "Blog Posts" into a month.

It is recommended to name these January, February etc

Add your "Blog Posts"below this folder.

Info.Name: Blog Posts Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to organise the"Blog Posts".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Posts Folder

Add "Year" folders below this folder to organise your "Blog Posts".

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

Info.Name: Blog RSS
Info.Description: Use this item to create your "Blog RSS Feed".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog RSS

This page will display the RSS feed for your blog posts.

Info.Name: Blog Year Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blog Year Folder".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Year Folder

Use this folder as a container to organise your "Blog Posts" into a year.

It is recommended to name these 2016, 2017 etc.

Add "Month" folders below this folder to organise your "Blog Posts".

Info.Name: Call to Action Strip
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Text/Signup Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Call to Action Strip

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Code Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Code Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Code
GenericProperty.Description: Enter your raw code here. This can be JavaScript, HTML etc.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Code Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Code Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Code Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Code
GenericProperty.Description: Enter your raw code here. This can be JavaScript, HTML etc.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Code Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Contact Form
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Contact Form" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Subscriber List ID
GenericProperty.Description: Newsletter Signup will only be available if a Subscriber List ID is available. Use this field to override the default Subscriber List ID in "Global Settings" if present.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Contact Form

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Content Master
Info.Description: This Document Type is used as the Master Document for all physical pages.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable delete
GenericProperty.Description: If "Yes" is selected, when a user attempts to delete this node they will be presented with a warning message indicating that this node cannot be deleted.

GenericProperty.Name: Alternative URL
GenericProperty.Description:
Use this field to provide multiple URLs for a content node.

For example if you were to enter "examplepage1,examplepage2/this-is-a-test", this would resolve the following URLs to the same page.

/examplepage1/ /examplepage2/this-is-a-test/

Please note that the values you use must be lowercase, not use a leading slash and not use a trailing ".aspx".

GenericProperty.Name: Open Graph image
GenericProperty.Description: This is an image associated with your media. We suggest that you use an image of at least 1200x630 pixels. If nothing is uploaded here the "Default Open Graph image" from your "Global Settings" will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Meta description
GenericProperty.Description: Use this field to enter a description for your webpage. This is the information that is displayed by search engines when your website appears in a search listing. Try and keep this below 155 characters.

GenericProperty.Name: Open Graph title
GenericProperty.Description: Use this field to override the default Open Graph title of your webpage. The default Open Graph title will be a combination of the current page node name and the website name defined in "Global Settings".

GenericProperty.Name: Open Graph description
GenericProperty.Description: A detailed description of the piece of content, usually between 2 and 4 sentences. This tag is technically optional, but can improve the rate at which links are read and shared.

GenericProperty.Name: Web page header title
GenericProperty.Description: Use this field to override the default page title of your webpage. The default page title will be a combination of the current page node name and the website name defined in "Global Settings".

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
If a link is added here it will override the default link added in "Global Settings".

Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

GenericProperty.Name: Hide outro strip section
GenericProperty.Description: Select "Yes" to hide the outro strip section if content has been added to "Global Settings" or above.

GenericProperty.Name: Override default outro strip section
GenericProperty.Description: Select "Yes" to override the default outro stip section if content has been added to "Global Settings".

GenericProperty.Name: Text
GenericProperty.Description: If text is added here it will override the default text added in "Global Settings"

Info.Name: Gallery Image
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Image" to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Image link
GenericProperty.Description:
Link will only be used if light window is disabled.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window title
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed above your image within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window image
GenericProperty.Description:
Image will be cropped to 400px x 300px and displayed as the gallery thumbnail.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

The original image you upload will be displayed within the light window uncropped.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window footer
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed below your image within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Gallery Image

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Gallery Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Gallery Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Gallery Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

You must add at least one "Gallery Image" or "Gallery Video" below this folder.

The order of your items within this folder directly relates to the order your items will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your items.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Gallery Video
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "YouTube" or "Vimeo" video to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window title
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed above your image within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window footer
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed below your image within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Video
GenericProperty.Description: Copy the full URL for your video from the address bar or share link provided. (YouTube or Vimeo only)

GenericProperty.Name: Thumbnail image
GenericProperty.Description:
This image is optional. If you do not upload an image, a thumbnail image will be automatically generated for you from the associated video.

Image will be cropped to 345px x 260px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Gallery Video

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: General Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "General Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
General Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Global Settings
Info.Description: Use this item to configure your websites "Global Settings".

GenericProperty.Name: Disable delete
GenericProperty.Description: If "Yes" is selected, when a user attempts to delete this node they will be presented with a warning message indicating that this node cannot be deleted.

GenericProperty.Name: Default sitewide pods
GenericProperty.Description: Select the default pods you would like to appear on the Standard Pages of your website.

GenericProperty.Name: Default Open Graph image
GenericProperty.Description: This is the default Open Graph image associated with your media. We suggest that you use an image of at least 1200x630 pixels.

GenericProperty.Name: Favicon and touch icons
GenericProperty.Description: This image will be used for your website favicon and device bookmarks. We suggest that you use an image of at least 310x310 pixels.

GenericProperty.Name: Website logo
GenericProperty.Description: We suggest that you use an image of at least 240 pixels in height. This is to ensure your logo is ready for both retina and non-retina displays.

GenericProperty.Name: Examine search provider name
GenericProperty.Description:
Enter the name of your Examine search provider defined in /Config/ExamineSettings.config

If nothing is entered the search form will not appear.

GenericProperty.Name: Search results page
GenericProperty.Description: If no page is selected the search form will not appear.

GenericProperty.Name: Website name
GenericProperty.Description: The text entered here will be be added to the default Meta title of your webpages and used for the hidden text behind your website logo.

GenericProperty.Name: Default standard page layout
GenericProperty.Description: If 'Content full width' is selected sub navigation will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Google business link
GenericProperty.Description: This must be a business page, not a user page.

GenericProperty.Name: Header scripts
GenericProperty.Description:
Example usage would be for entering Google Analytics Script code.

Anything you enter here will be placed before the closing </head> tag on every page of your website.

GenericProperty.Name: Footer scripts
GenericProperty.Description: Anything you enter here will be placed before the closing </body> tag on every page of your website.

GenericProperty.Name: Email Marketing Platform
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is selected Newsletter Signup will not be available.

GenericProperty.Name: API Key
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is entered Newsletter Signup will not be available.

GenericProperty.Name: Subscriber List ID
GenericProperty.Description: Newsletter Signup will only be available if a Subscriber List ID is available. Individual signup forms can have there own Subscriber List ID however the one entered here will be used as the default.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Global Settings

This item controls global settings that relate to your website as a whole.

DO NOT delete or rename this item.

Info.Name: Grid Layout Section
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Grid Layout Section".

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Grid Layout Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Homepage
Info.Description: Use this item to create your website "Homepage".

GenericProperty.Name: Website configuration node
GenericProperty.Description: Select the 'Website Configuration' node that will control the global properties of this website.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Homepage

To add content to this page you are required to add components to the "Page Components" folder directly below this page.

By adding new components you will be able to organise the layout and content of this page.

Info.Name: Image Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Image Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Light window image
GenericProperty.Description:
Image will be cropped to 400px x 300px and displayed as the thumbnail.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

The original image you upload will be displayed within the light window uncropped.

GenericProperty.Name: Image link
GenericProperty.Description: Link will only be used if light window is disabled.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window footer
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed below your image within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window title
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed above your image within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Image Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Links Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Links Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Links
GenericProperty.Description: The "Caption" field is used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Links Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Listing Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Listing Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Link to listing
GenericProperty.Description:
Link this to a page that contains sub pages. Sub pages will be listed.

Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Listing Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Login Page
Info.Description: Use this item to create your websites "Login Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Page layout
GenericProperty.Description: Default page layout will be displayed if nothing is selected. If 'Content full width' is selected sub navigation will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Login success page
GenericProperty.Description: Select the page to go to when login is successful.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Login Page

This page displays a login form for gaining access to password protected areas of your website.

Info.Name: Navigation
Info.Description: Use this item to configure your websites "Navigation Menus".

GenericProperty.Name: Disable delete
GenericProperty.Description: If "Yes" is selected, when a user attempts to delete this node they will be presented with a warning message indicating that this node cannot be deleted.

GenericProperty.Name: Top navigation
GenericProperty.Description:
Select the links you would like to appear on the "Top Navigation" of your website.

The "Caption" field is used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Display sub pages
GenericProperty.Description: Tick this box to include sub pages in the "Main Navigation".

GenericProperty.Name: Main navigation
GenericProperty.Description:
Select the links you would like to appear on the "Main Navigation" of your website.

The "Caption" field is used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Footer navigation
GenericProperty.Description:
Select the links you would like to appear on the "Footer Navigation" of your website.

The "Caption" field is used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Quick links
GenericProperty.Description:
Select the links you would like to appear on the "Quick links" section of your website.

The "Caption" field is used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Logged in members navigation
GenericProperty.Description: Select the pages you would like to appear on the "Logged in Members Navigation" of your website. The "Caption" field is used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Navigation heading
GenericProperty.Description: This will override the default heading defined in the Dictionary Section of Umbraco.

GenericProperty.Name: Login page
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is selected the "Members Navigation" will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Navigation

This item controls the navigation elements available on your website.

DO NOT delete or rename this item.

Info.Name: Newsletter Signup Form
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Newsletter Signup Form" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Subscriber List ID
GenericProperty.Description: Newsletter Signup will only be available if a Subscriber List ID is available. Use this field to override the default Subscriber List ID in "Global Settings" if present.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Newsletter Signup Form

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Newsletter Signup Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Newsletter Signup Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Subscriber List ID
GenericProperty.Description: Newsletter Signup will only be available if a Subscriber List ID is available. Use this field to override the default Subscriber List ID in "Global Settings" if present.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Newsletter Signup Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Pod" to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description:
Image will be cropped to 400px x 300px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Pods Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Pods Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Pod Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

You must add at least one "Pod" below this folder.

The order of your "Pods" within this folder directly relates to the order your "Pods" will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your "Pods".

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Links
GenericProperty.Description:
Select the links you would like to appear in the "Outro" section of this component.

The "Caption" field is used for your link text.

Info.Name: Resource Item
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Resource Item" to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Attachment
GenericProperty.Description: The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Resource Item

The node name you enter above will be displayed as the "Resource Name".

Info.Name: Resources Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Resources Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Resources Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

You must add at least one "Resource Item" below this folder.

The order of your "Resource Items" within this folder directly relates to the order your "Resource Items" will be displayed on this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Search Results Page
Info.Description: Use this item to create your website "Search Results Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Page layout
GenericProperty.Description: Default page layout will be displayed if nothing is selected. If 'Content full width' is selected sub navigation will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Search results page size
GenericProperty.Description: Enter the number of search results you would like to appear per page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Search Results Page

This page displays a listing of your search results.

Info.Name: Signup/Subpage Listing Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Signup/Subpage Listing Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Subscriber List ID
GenericProperty.Description:
Newsletter Signup will only be available if a Subscriber List ID is available.

Use this field to override the default Subscriber List ID in "Global Settings" if present.

GenericProperty.Name: Summary text character count
GenericProperty.Description:
Enter the number of characters you would like displayed from the beginning of each page (General pages and Blog posts).

If summary text has been entered this will be used instead. Summary text must be entered on Advanced pages for this to be displayed. If nothing is entered, no summary text will be displayed.

GenericProperty.Name: Pages to display
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is entered, this section will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Link to listing
GenericProperty.Description:
Link this to a page that contains sub pages. Sub pages will be listed.
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

GenericProperty.Name: Newsletter section position
GenericProperty.Description: Display newsletter section to the left or right of the listing section.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Signup/Subpage Listing Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Sitemap Page
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Sitemap Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Page layout
GenericProperty.Description: Default page layout will be displayed if nothing is selected. If 'Content full width' is selected sub navigation will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Sitemap Page

This page displays your website sitemap.

Info.Name: Sitewide Pods Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to organise the "Sitewide Pods" available on your website.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Sitewide Pods

Add items below this folder to create "Sitewide pods" that will be available for display on "Standard Pages" and "Standard Page Blog Posts".

The "Pods" tab within "Global Settings" is used to control the default pods that will be added to "Standard Pages" and "Standard Page Blog Posts".

The "Pods" tab on each "Standard Page" and "Standard Page Blog Post" can be used to override the default pods that have been selected.

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

Info.Name: Sitewide Pods Master
Info.Description: This Document Type is used as a container to manage all Document Types that are related to Sitewide Pods.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable delete
GenericProperty.Description: If "Yes" is selected, when a user attempts to delete this node they will be presented with a warning message indicating that this node cannot be deleted.

Info.Name: Slideshow Image
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Image" to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description:
Image will be cropped to 1140px x 550px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Slideshow Image

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Slideshow Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Slideshow Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Slideshow Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

You must add at least one "Slideshow Image" below this folder.

The order of your "Slideshow Images" within this folder directly relates to the order your "Slideshow Images" will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your "Accordion/Tab Items".

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Standard Component Master
Info.Description: This Document Type is used as a container to manage all Document Types that are related to Standard Components.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable delete
GenericProperty.Description: If "Yes" is selected, when a user attempts to delete this node they will be presented with a warning message indicating that this node cannot be deleted.

Info.Name: Standard Page
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Standard Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Sub navigation link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Subpage listing link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Subpage listing layout
GenericProperty.Description: Layout will default to 'Vertical' if nothing is selected.

GenericProperty.Name: Hide sub navigation
GenericProperty.Description: Select "Yes" to hide the sub navigation menu from this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Page layout
GenericProperty.Description: Default page layout will be displayed if nothing is selected. If "Content full width" is selected sub navigation will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Summary text character count
GenericProperty.Description: Enter the number of characters you would like displayed from the beginning of each page. If summary text has been entered this will be used instead. If nothing is entered, no summary text will be displayed.

GenericProperty.Name: Display subpage listing
GenericProperty.Description: Select "Yes" to display a listing of any subpages that sit below this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Standard Page

The majority of your content will be added to this page via the "Content" tab.

Additional layout options are available which can be added via the "Page Components" folder directly below this page.

By adding new components you will be able to add more advanced layout options to this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Listing image
GenericProperty.Description:
Listing image is only displayed if this page appears on a "Sub Page Listing".

Image will be cropped to 400px x 300px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Page summary
GenericProperty.Description:
Summary text is only displayed if this page appears on a "Subpage Listing".

If nothing is entered here the summary will be extracted from the beginning of the "Main content" of this page and the character count will be based on the settings defined on this pages parent page.

Info.Name: Standard Page Blog Post
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Standard Page Blog Post".

GenericProperty.Name: Breadcrumb link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable comments
GenericProperty.Description: Tick this box to disable commenting for this post. This is only relevant if you have entered a "Disqus username" on your "Blog Landing Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Categories
GenericProperty.Description: If selecting a child category make sure you also select the parent categories.

GenericProperty.Name: Page layout
GenericProperty.Description: Default page layout will be displayed if nothing is selected. If 'Content full width' is selected sub navigation will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Standard Page Blog Post

The majority of your content will be added to this page via the "Content" tab.

Additional layout options are available which can be added via the "Page Components" folder directly below this page.

By adding new components you will be able to add more advanced layout options to this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Listing image
GenericProperty.Description:
Image will be cropped to 1140px x 550px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Post summary
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is entered here the summary will be extracted from the beginning of the "Main Content" of your post and the character count will be based on the settings defined on your "Blog Landing Page".

Info.Name: Standard Page Components Folder
Info.Description: This item is added automatically to each "Standard Page" to organise your page components.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Page Components

Add components below this folder to organise the layout and content of your page.

The order of your components within this folder directly relates to the order your components will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your components.

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

GenericProperty.Name: Main image
GenericProperty.Description:
Image will be cropped to 1140px x 550px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Page title
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Pods
GenericProperty.Description: Select the pods you would like to appear on this page. The pods selected will only be displayed if "Yes" is selected above.

GenericProperty.Name: Override default pods
GenericProperty.Description: Select "Yes" to override the default pods selected within "Global Settings".

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description:
Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

If the banner contains an image, use the color that works best for the text over the image.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description:
For all Parallax and Takeover banners, your image will be cropped to 1600px by 1600px.

If you choose a 'Medium' banner style without the Parallax effect your image will be cropped to 1600px by 700px.

If you choose a 'Short' banner style without the Parallax effect your image will be cropped to 1600px by 500px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

Info.Name: Text Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Text Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Text Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Use this item to add text between other components you have added to the page.

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: This setting only applies if this component is added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page".

Info.Name: Text/Signup Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Text/Signup Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

GenericProperty.Name: Text section position
GenericProperty.Description: Display text section to the left or right of the newsletter signup form.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Campaign Monitor Subscriber List ID
GenericProperty.Description:
Newsletter Signup will only be available if a Subscriber List ID is available.

Use this field to override the default Subscriber List ID in "Global Settings" if present.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Text/Signup Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Text/Video or Image Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Text/Video or Image Section" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Text section position
GenericProperty.Description: Display text section to the left or right of the video or image.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will decide what color is used for any text that appears over the background.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window text
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed along with your video within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Video
GenericProperty.Description: Copy the full URL for your video from the address bar or share link provided. (YouTube or Vimeo only)

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description:
This image is optional. If you do not upload an image and a video URL has been added, a thumbnail image will be automatically generated for you from the associated video.

Image will be cropped to 800px x 600px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description:
Use the 'Caption' field to override the default link text.

The tab that is open will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Heading style chosen will not affect font size. This option is purely for setting your heading hierarchy for SEO purposes.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Text/Video or Image Section

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Video Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Video Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Video
GenericProperty.Description: Copy the full URL for your video from the address bar or share link provided. (YouTube or Vimeo only)

GenericProperty.Name: Light window title
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed above your video within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Thumbnail image
GenericProperty.Description:
This image is optional. If you do not upload an image, a thumbnail image will be automatically generated for you from the associated video.

Image will be cropped to 400px x 300px.

Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window footer
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed below your video within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Video Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Website Configuration Section
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Website Configuration Section" to your website.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable delete
GenericProperty.Description: If "Yes" is selected, when a user attempts to delete this node they will be presented with a warning message indicating that this node cannot be deleted.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Website Configuration

Items below this node manage your website configuration settings.

DO NOT delete or rename this item.

Template.Name: USN Advanced Page Blog Post
USN Blog Landing Page
USN Home Redirect
USN Login Page
USN Master
Template.Design:
@inherits Umbraco.Web.Mvc.UmbracoTemplatePage @{ Layout = null; } @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_SEOPageHead", @Model.Content) @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_InternalStyles", @Model.Content) @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_Icons", @Model.Content) @RenderSection("Head", false) @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_HeaderScripts", @Model.Content)
@Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_WebsiteLogo", @Model.Content) Menu
@Html.Partial("USNNavigation/USN_MainNavigation", @Model.Content) @Html.Partial("USNForms/USN_SearchForm", @Model.Content) @Html.Partial("USNNavigation/USN_TopNavigation", @Model.Content)
@RenderBody() @Html.Partial("USNMiscPageElements/USN_OutroStripSection", @Model.Content) @Html.Partial("USNNavigation/USN_Breadcrumb", @Model.Content)
@Html.Partial("USNWebsiteFooterSection/USN_FooterContactInformation", @Model.Content)
@Html.Partial("USNNavigation/USN_FooterQuickLinks", @Model.Content)
@Html.Partial("USNWebsiteFooterSection/USN_FooterSocialLinks", @Model.Content)
  • © @DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyy")
    • @Html.Partial("USNNavigation/USN_FooterNavigation", @Model.Content)
  • a premium Umbraco theme from
    uSkinned™
@RenderSection("FooterScripts", false) @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteFooterSection/USN_FooterScripts", @Model.Content)
